p: In the element analysis, the mass fraction of GO and NGO are 68.8/30.6/0.6 (C/O/H) and 57.6/8.0/33.9/0.5 (C/N/O/H) respectively. After simplifying to the chemical formula, the NGO is C 48H 5O 21.2N 5.7 and GO is C 47.8H 5O 15.9. In the GO sheet, the number ratio of O/C is about 0.33 and the value would increase to 0.44 after nitrification.
